name: My Pal Rocky
description:
You're never alone... with a Pet Rock by your side!

Meet our hero, a boy trapped in his grandma's attic while she goes off to bingo. Grandma slid a few pieces of ham under the door for us to eat while she was away, but the spiders stole our ham for themselves! Now, it is our quest to battle the spiders with our rocky friends to get our ham back!
Place your pet rock friends around the player to create a shield of damage between you and the spiders coming after you. Buy more rocks from the curio shop using lint obtained while fighting.
- - - - - - - - - - Controls - - - - - - - - - -
WASD : Movement
Mouse : Aligning rocks around the player
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
